Description:
Brand Retail Merchandiser (Perfumes & Cosmetics)Plan and develop merchandising strategies that balance customers’ expectations and company’s objectives.
Analyse sales figures, customers reactions and market trends to anticipate product needs and plan product ranges/stock.
Maintain store shelves and inventory.
Forecast profits/sales and plan budgets.
Monitor stock movement and consider markdowns, promotions, price changes, clear outs etc.
Build constructive customer relationships and team with channel partners to build pipeline and close deals.
Remain up to date with industry’s best practices.Skills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in marketing, finance, or another relevant field is strongly preferred.
Prior experience as a retail merchandiser, visual merchandiser, or similar.
Computer literate.
Experience conducting market research.
Ability to create appropriate and engaging product displays.
Knowledge of pertinent statistical procedures to facilitate data analysis.
Excellent verbal and written communication.
Attentive to stockists' and consumers' needs.
Professional.
